workflows.creator: f21f100c-9e62-42e2-a744-061c18de134c
workflows.title: On Opportunity Netsuite Id changed
workflows.description: Executes when the opportunity netsuite id is changed

salesforce-3.title: Update Status
salesforce-3.description: Update Subscription Status field in the opportunity

script-1.title: Get current status
script-1.description:
Get the current status based on the price lines.
If has one Active item, it's Activated.
If doesn't have active item, and has one terminated item, its Terminated.
Otherwise it's Draft.

storage-2.title: Save status
storage-2.description: Save subscription status to be sync to salesforce

netsuite-2.title: Get reason
netsuite-2.description: Get the reason for the latest termination change order

raw_query.value:
SELECT r.name FROM subscriptionchangeorder sco
INNER JOIN CUSTOMRECORDSUB_STATUS_CHANGE_REASON r on sco.custrecord_st_change_reason = r.id
WHERE sco.subscription = {$.steps.salesforce-2.records[0].NetSuite_ID__c} and sco.action = 'TERMINATE' and sco.subscriptionchangeorderstatus = 'ACTIVE'
ORDER BY sco.effectivedate desc, sco.id desc

boolean-condition-2.title: Process opportunity?
boolean-condition-2.description: If netsuite id is empty or opportunity is already closed, we are not going to do anything

storage-3.title: Get status
storage-3.description: get subscription status to be sync to salesforce

message.value: Event is from another org ('{$.steps.trigger.organization_id}' instead of '{$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].Id}'). Please fix the sandbox outbound messages list.

storage-1.title: Save status
storage-1.description: Save subscription status to be sync to salesforce

netsuite-1.title: Get Subscription
netsuite-1.description: Get the subscription to check what is the status of this subscription

boolean-condition-4.title: Status is different?
boolean-condition-4.description: Only update the status if is different

loop-1.title: Loop Opportunities
loop-1.description: Loop through all the changed opportunities

boolean-condition-3.title: Terminated status?
boolean-condition-3.description: For Terminated Status we need to get the latest change order to check the reason because we have different status in salesforce depending on the reason.
